::Lord Jhiaxus::
=A0
Jhiaxus executes several evasive manuvers which avoid =
the attacks but do not leave him with any opening to counter. He pulls away=
 attempting to gain some distance and regroup.
=A0
Jhiaxus: We are simply b=
eing outnumbered and overpowered. We need a new strategy or reinforcements =
and we need them now.
=A0
::Scorponok-Zarak::
=A0
Zarak pilots Scorponok to=
 burrow underground again. The tip of his tail weapon remains above the sur=
face. Useing the sensors in the cockpit Zarak begins targeting Sweeps as be=
st as possible with his fusion cannon. He opens a commlink on the allied ch=
annels.
=A0
Zarak: Without the Maximals putting in more effort or any aid f=
rom the fake Megatron over there we arn't making it out of this.
=A0
::Grim=
lock::
=A0
Grimlock makes a run for it but takes several hits. His armor wa=
s able to withstand a full disintergration but Grimlock wasn't willing to t=
ake another shot.
=A0
Grimlock: Per-see-us, me Grimlock think we need retre=
at! Orders?!

--- On Wed, 6/25/08, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>=
 wrote:

From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
Subject: Re: All Ou=
t War
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, June 25, 2008, 7:03 AM


=






The attacks from Jhiaxus, Scorponok, Hydras and Myrmidon are remarkab=
ly effective at first as the=A0firepower burned into the sweeps, destroying=
 quite a few of them in bright explosions=A0sending bits of metal and armor=
 spewing in different directions.=A0=A0
=A0
The Sweeps swirl in the air for=
 a moment and then seperate, leaving the nice and easy formations of before=
, and becoming apparently just a mass of disorginized attackers, making the=
m much harder to hit several with a single shot!
=A0
As they come back towa=
rds the ground they target Grimlock, Scorponok and Hydras with disintergrat=
ion beams from several different directions, even as more Sweeps come at Jh=
iaxus and Myrmidon, cannons flaring! 
=A0
(OOC: I will get more specific in=
 the next round of posting)

Preston
(da'minion)

=A0
----- Original Messag=
e ----
From: Richard Allen <roborick007@ yahoo.com>
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
 com
Sent: Tuesday, June 24, 2008 9:40:52 PM
Subject: Re: All Out War





=



::Lord Jhiaxus::
=A0
As the Sweeps start to break off Jhiaxus pulls up a=
t a steep angle. This avoids the last shots.
=A0
Jhiaxus: Don't let up. The=
y can't be finished!
=A0
Jhiaxus comes up high in the air and turns about. =
He comes at the Sweeps. At the very last second he pulls up above them and =
starts droping cluster bombs.
=A0
::Scorponok- Zarak::
=A0
Scorponok releas=
es two missiles from each pincer at the nearest mass of Sweeps.

--- On Mon=
, 6/23/08, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ yahoo.com> wrote:

From: Super Cy=
clonus <supercyclonus@ yahoo.com>
Subject: Re: All Out War
To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups. com
Date: Monday, June 23, 2008, 5:28 PM






> Jhiaxus' boasts ar=
e stopped as he realized that although he was effective, the 
> Sweeps had =
changes strategy and were boxing him in. Suddenly some of the 
> rear Sweep=
s were destroyed by Myrmidon. Jhiaxus banks out of the trap with him.
> 
> =
Jhiaxus: I hate to say this but I wish the Maximals would fight back more..=
.
=A0
Myrmidon grunted as he fell in with Jhiaxus, =93They are pitiful fool=
s but how can even they sit there and do nothing as the ground upon which t=
hey stand is being blown out from beneath them!?=94
=A0
> As Sweeps moved i=
nto position to box in Jhiaxus again. Jhiaxus pulls up and 
> performs a 36=
0 degree dive, ending up behind the approaching Sweeps. He 
> fires all roc=
kets and lasers.
=A0
Myrmidon followed Jhiaxus, his maneuver not quite as e=
legant as the G2 Decepticon co-commander, but he managed to come around, li=
ning up on the Sweeps!
=A0
From their twin bursts of firepower many sweeps =
vanish in bright clusters of explosions that peal through the skies! A rath=
er respectable gap is opened up for the duo as the moved through the skies.=
 
=A0
> Blckfortress defences burned as Minions started to hit them, the re=
pair drones 
> started to work but they started to fall as well. hydras cot=
inued opening fire
> against the minions
=A0
The sweeps are generally takin=
g a beating, but it can be noted that they are learning as they go, becomin=
g smarter and more agile as the weaponry they are faced with begins to grow=
. Many of them are gunned down by the laser fire of Myrmidon, Jhiaxus and t=
hen the Black Fortress, and yet they continue to keep coming, an unrelentin=
g force of power rushing the meager defenders of the Predicon base. 
=A0
Wi=
th an eerie strangeness, as if guided by some unseen intelligence, they fir=
e their weapons in retaliation completely in sync, disintegrator beams ripp=
ing into the jets (Myrmidon/Jhiaxus) above and at the (Black) fortress belo=
w. Then swiftly they swoop high into the air again, temporarily giving the =
base below a gap, a small space to breathe. It is obvious that any moment n=
ow they will again begin to press their attack as their numbers quickly beg=
in to regroup and organize.
=A0
> OOC: if drones arent allowed just ignore =
that part
=A0
OOC: I can=92t speak for anyone else, but I have no problem w=
ith drones.
=A0
Preston
(Da'minion)
